com.karangandhi.networking.TCP

Class TCPClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.karangandhi.networking.TCP.TCPClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OwnerObject

    public abstract class TCPClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements OwnerObject
    This is the TCPClient class which will create a client that connects to the server on the given port

    • Constructor Detail

      • TCPClient

        public TCPClient(java.lang.String ip,
                 int port,
                 boolean verbose)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an instance of TCPClient
        Parameters:
        ip - The ip address of the server
        port - The port of the server
        verbose - If you want the client to be verbose
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws an IOException if no server exists on the given ip and port
